data.name: Ninja?
data.detailed_description:
Granting you with absolute control "Ninja?" puts you in the shoes of a parkouring robot as you hurdle through space to avoid objects and jump through gates to set new high scores. Using a variety of abilities such as dash, double jump, and sprint, it is up to you to make it as far as you can through a procedurally generated level in this endless runner style game. Go for the high score or take it slow and go for distance, the choice is yours.

Play though a training course to perfect your skills or go for the distance in an endless procedurally generated level.

Developer Message:
On certain machines, the game will not run properly. This is a known issue and is currently being looked into. Thank you.

data.short_description: Ninja? features a variety of movement abilities to help you traverse a procedurally generated level for endless runner fun.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core or similar
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 500 series or similar
  • Storage: 90 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
